attributes.title: this app RUINED my life
attributes.review: i was simply enjoying my day and was fiddling with my phone when i decided to download this app, HUGE MISTAKE! A group of men in black suits jumped me in my backyard and dragged me to a white van. Inside the van was a horribly orange old man who wouldnâ€™t stop threatening to delete an app called tiktok. Imagine the absolute horror i was feeling. He dropped kicked me, spat on the floor and promptly shot my grandma with an AK37 before speeding away mentioning something about sexcy time with this girl named ivanka? The trauma this app has cause has deeply wounded my mental health. Dear god TAKE IT DOWN

attributes.title: Disgusting app
attributes.review: This app is the most crusty musty dusty app I have ever downloaded in my whole entire life. Literally the first time I opened it I wanted to throw up because of the disgusting things on this app. Not to mention the fact that this app used mind control on my guinea pig and made her bite my toes. Ew. Also, my curtains kept insulting me after they used this app which is unacceptable. This app is not safe and shouldnâ€™t be available to download. This app is destroying America and I think we might need a new president if this is not his app.

attributes.title: Dump Tr*mp
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it immediately called me the n word. With the hard â€œrâ€. I felt offended so I filed a complaint but I was told that this is the most progressive app out there. The sad part is that people out there were defending the app, saying that I took the quote out of context and claiming that this app is â€œmaking America great againâ€. I do not recommend getting this app if you are a minority, a member of the LGBTQ+ community, or a woman or if you support minorities, the LGBTQ+ community, and women. If I could give it less than one star I would ğŸ¤®.

attributes.title: Cheeto man hacked my phone

Then I see a link saying get your free v-bucks so I clicked on it and saw the Cheeto man saying haha noob you just got hacked so I immediately clicked off the app and saw that my home screen was the Cheeto man and Ted Bundy making out so I had to destroy my phone and get a new one and since then me and my family are traumatized and emotionally scared for life and what Iâ€™m most angry about is that I never  claimed my free v-bucks.
